no_data_year_range: No data to obtain year range
enable_map_view_metrics: Enable metrics update based on map view
disable_map_view_metrics: Disable metrics update based on map view
map_attribute_source: Source: Esri, Maxar, GeoEye, Earthstar Geographics, CNES/Airbus DS, USDA, USGS, AeroGRID, IGN, and the GIS User Community
